Text:
This is the real deal!

Sorry about the previous torrents. This really is the complete Season One of 24.

Download and enjoy!!!!!!!
Wonderful - does anyone have English subtitles for this?
could someone please reseed this.  I have 99% of it and there are now no seeds up on it and have not been for a few days.
It sure is in English, but I'm not - always good with English subtitles if you miss some words here and there.

to people who have already downloaded it: please do your part and seed to help others!
thanks a lot!
